<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Updates topic type for the existing topics that are created prior to paris release</description>
        <name>Update Topic Type</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[function updateTopicType(table) {
    var gr = new GlideRecord(table);
	gr.addNullQuery("type");
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
		if (gr.library) {
			gr.type = "TOPIC_BLOCK";
		}
		else{
			gr.type = "STANDARD";
		}
		gr.update();
    }
}

updateTopicType("sys_cb_topic");
updateTopicType("sys_cs_topic");]]></script>
